title: How to Make Fertilizer from Banana Peels

steps.headline: Place a tray in the oven and lay banana peels on it.
steps.description: Place the banana peels on the tray with the outer skin facing down so that they don't stick to the tray.

steps.headline: Leave the tray with the banana peels in the oven when you cook other food.
steps.description: Save energy by piggy-backing on your normal oven usage. Don't turn the oven on just to roast the banana peels. Just leave the tray in the oven until you're cooking something else.

steps.headline: After the banana peels are cool, break them up and store them in an airtight container.
Use as a fertilizer.
steps.description: Spread the banana peel mulch around houseplants and garden plants. The cooked peels will fertilize the plants as they break down.

tyn: Banana peels (add them to the tray as the bananas are eaten)
text: Place a tray in the oven and lay banana peels on it. Place the banana peels on the tray with the outer skin facing down so that they don't stick to the tray. Leave the tray with the banana peels in the oven when you cook other food. Save energy by piggy-backing on your normal oven usage. Don't turn the oven on just to roast the banana peels. Just leave the tray in the oven until you're cooking something else. After the banana peels are cool, break them up and store them in an airtight container.  Use as a fertilizer. Spread the banana peel mulch around houseplants and garden plants. The cooked peels will fertilize the plants as they break down.
sentences: Place a tray in the oven and lay banana peels on it.
Place the banana peels on the tray with the outer skin facing down so that they don't stick to the tray.
Leave the tray with the banana peels in the oven when you cook other food.
Save energy by piggy-backing on your normal oven usage.
Don't turn the oven on just to roast the banana peels.
Just leave the tray in the oven until you're cooking something else.
After the banana peels are cool, break them up and store them in an airtight container.
Spread the banana peel mulch around houseplants and garden plants.
The cooked peels will fertilize the plants as they break down.
